Calling All Early Adopters


We are looking for innovative companies in the oil, natural gas, petrochemical, and electrical industries who would like to participate in the Streamlyne Early Adopter Program.


Your company is, or aspires to be:

  • An innovator in your sector that values cutting edge technology
  • Has an entrepreneurial mindset
  • Would like to help create new industry standards
  • Discover new ways how analytics, algorithms, insights, and predictions can help your company and exceed the expectations of your customers.
  • Eager to learn more about technology, industry trends, and entrepreneurial “outside of the box” development.



Early Adopter Program Criteria:

  • Large oil, natural gas, petrochemical, or electrical company
  • Have Distributed Control Systems, Asset Management Systems (IBM Maximo, SAP, Oracle, OpenText) that we can integrate to or connect via REST API
  • Able to provide a large data-set from your plant management systems for testing in the Streamlyne custom analytics platform.
  • Willing to allow Streamlyne to work with at least one plant, collecting feedback from operators and managers to help with product development.
  • Able to be a referenceable customer for marketing purposes.

If this sounds like your company, then we would love to work with you. Please contact Todd Murphy at todd@streamlyne.co
